# cook your dish here

mod=10**9+7
store=dict()
def power10(N):
 x=bin(N)
 i=-1
 tmp=10
 r=1
 while x[i]!='b':
  if x[i]=='1':
   r*=tmp
   r%=mod
  #print(tmp,r,tmp*r)
  tmp=(tmp%mod)*(tmp%mod)
  tmp%=mod
  i-=1
 return r%mod

from sys import stdin, stdout
T=int(input().strip())

for _ in range(T):
 N,W=map(int,input().strip().split())
 dp=[-1]*(N+1)
 dp[0]=1
 if W>8 or W<-9:
  print(0)
 else:
  if W>=0:
   if store.get(N-2)==None:
    store[N-2]=power10(N-2)
   res=(9-W)*store[N-2]
  else:
   if store.get(N-2)==None:
    store[N-2]=power10(N-2)
   res=(W+10)*store[N-2]
  print(res%mod)

# cook your dish here

mod=10**9+7

def power10(N):
 x=bin(N)
 i=-1
 tmp=10
 r=1
 while x[i]!='b':
  if x[i]=='1':
   r*=tmp
   r%=mod
  #print(tmp,r,tmp*r)
  tmp=(tmp%mod)*(tmp%mod)
  tmp%=mod
  i-=1
 return r

from sys import stdin, stdout
T=int(input().strip())

for _ in range(T):
 N,W=map(int,input().strip().split())
 dp=[-1]*(N+1)
 dp[0]=1
 if W>8 or W<-9:
  print(0)
 else:
  if W>=0:
   res=(9-W)*power10(N-2)
  else:
   res=(W+10)*power10(N-2)
  print(res%mod)
